MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: PHP 5.2 or newer, MySQL 5 or newer

English.Char_Desc_45: Administration of MySQL over the Web.
English.Char_Desc_80: A tool that handles the basic administration of MySQL over the Web.
English.Char_Desc_250: phpMyAdmin is a free software tool written in PHP intended to handle the administration of MySQL over the Web. phpMyAdmin supports a wide range of operations with MySQL, providing intuitive user interface for most of them.
English.Char_Desc_450: phpMyAdmin is a free software tool written in PHP intended to handle the administration of MySQL over the Web. phpMyAdmin supports a wide range of operations with MySQL. The most frequently used operations are supported by the user interface (managing databases, tables, fields, relations, indexes, users, permissions, etc), while you still have the ability to directly execute any SQL statement.
English.Char_Desc_2000: phpMyAdmin is a free software tool written in PHP intended to handle the administration of MySQL over the Web. phpMyAdmin supports a wide range of operations with MySQL. The most frequently used operations are supported by the user interface (managing databases, tables, fields, relations, indexes, users, permissions, etc), while you still have the ability to directly execute any SQL statement. To ease usage to a wide range of people, phpMyAdmin is translated into 55 languages and supports both LTR and RTL languages.

Czech.Char_Desc_80: Správa databází MySQL přes webové rozhraní.
Czech.Char_Desc_250: Nástroj pro vzdálenou správu MySQL databází přes webové rozhraní. Umožňuje například tvorbu datových polí a tabulek, nastavení práva atd.
Czech.Char_Desc_450: Nástroj pro vzdálenou správu MySQL databází přes webové rozhraní. Umožňuje například tvorbu datových polí a tabulek, nastavení práva atd.
Czech.Char_Desc_2000: Nástroj pro vzdálenou správu MySQL databází přes webové rozhraní. Umožňuje například tvorbu datových polí a tabulek, nastavení práva atd.
